author: gdamour
msg: It is now possible to set the value of a CMP field mapped to a FK column, in
other words a CMR field. The previous implementation was only allowing for a
Note that in the case of a CMP field mapped to a CMR field related to an EJB
having a compound PK, the implementation is still read-only.

author: dblevins
msg: Magic bit that should make per-webapp work better now

author: dblevins
msg: Renamed ClasspathUtils.Loader to ClasspathUtils.ClassPath.  Will be moving it shortly.

author: dblevins
msg: I can't fix this Tomcat integration issue with all the silly statics.  Killing the statics.  Death to the statics!
Added a class called SystemInstance, which is a singleton and hopefully the only important static for the 1.0 codebase someday.
Changed FileUtils to get its instances from SystemInstance, then inlined all that code.
Changed ClasspathUtils to get its Loader instance from SystemInstance and managed to inline all the remaining code.
